summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from May 1, 2016, to May 31, 2016. It details deposits, withdrawals, and fees associated with the account, including a significant incoming transfer from Harlequin Dane, LLC.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Harlequin Dane, LLC
persons.context: Harlequin Dane, LLC is noted as the source of a significant incoming money transfer to the account.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: An incoming money transfer of $30,600.00 from Harlequin Dane, LLC was credited to the account.

events.title: Deposit
events.description: A deposit of $15,300.00 was made to the account.

keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances and transactions for May 2016.
Paul Morris is the account holder mentioned in the document.
A significant incoming transfer of $30,600.00 from Harlequin Dane, LLC is noted.
The account had a beginning balance of $361,170.13 as of May 1, 2016.
No service charges or overdraft fees were incurred during this statement period.
